entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Puntzi Mountain
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:36 AM PST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.3°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear except partly cloudy over southern sections early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. High minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
